Constructor Detail

NgramModel

public NgramModel(int n,
                  java.lang.String inp)
Create an n-gram frequency model for an input string ngrams at the end of the string wrap to the front e.g. "abbbbc" includes "bca" and "cab" in its 3-grams

Parameters:
int - n size of n-grams to create
String - inp input string to be modelled

NgramModel

public NgramModel(java.lang.String inp)
default constructor generates model for ngrams of size 1

int the size of the alphabet of a given input

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getDictionary()
Returns:
HashMap the ngram dictionary with word frequencies

getNumWords

public int getNumWords()
Returns:
int the total number of ngram words counted in the model

getTopWords

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTopWords(int freq)
Make list of all words with frequency at least freq

Parameters:
freq - int lower frequency limit for returned words
Returns:
ArrayList all words with frequency more than freq

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
String representation of the ngram model
